ritual_kit.mini_ritual: On the balcony, speak one sanctuary intention, then sweep a threshold.

upcoming_events.transit_notes: Moon brushes natal Saturn, approaches Uranus; squares natal Jupiter. Saturn stations retrograde in Pisces.
upcoming_events.reflection: Disciplined but awake; widen horizons without overextending.

housewitch_chore.task: Bedroom refresh: strip bedding, shake rugs, spritz linens.
Front courtyard tidy: sweep paths, trim one bush.
Dust leaves + water/fertilize one plant ready for growth.

kitchen_witch.idea: Lemon-herb chicken & quinoa bowl with roasted peppers & zucchini.

creative_flow.mode: Draft vignette about a horizon/expansion moment.

evening_reflection.prompt1: What opened up today that I want more of?
evening_reflection.prompt2: What weight can I set down before sleep?

horoscope.summary: Discipline + grounded optimism. Protect your time, direct energy into a single structure-building task.
